system.description: Small @L[Creature:Centaur]{centaurs} from the Southern Isles. They are thought to be a long lost centaur tribe that split off before the 1st age.

overview.base: Harsh conditions or long exertions do not easily tire you. You have @L[Core:Advantage]{advantage} on all saves or checks made to against exhaustion, running out of breath, starvation, thirst, heat, and cold.
